title: Serious Game-Based Workplace Competency Enhancement Program: Practical Learning Through Simulation and Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational administrative/management task understanding, basic social science concepts
context.additional_context: A course focusing on team-based role-playing and problem-solving in smartphone-based VR/simulation environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply inquiry-based problem-solving strategies in three or more workplace scenarios (e.g., customer service, project management).
Learners can improve job expertise by 20% or more through situational learning while performing tasks in a simulation environment.
Learners can receive real-time feedback via in-game formative assessments and propose improvements to work processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
